subject: #37 and #40 in BPJ2
msgSnippet: I just realized another thing which speaks in favor of switching #37 to U and #40 to B: #40 B and #39 U will be mapped to uppercase letters which are next to
messageBody:
I just realized another thing which speaks in favor of switching #37
to U and #40 to B: #40 B and #39 U will be mapped to uppercase letters
which are next to each other on the keyboard. At the same time #37 U
will be mapped to the uppercase letter corresponding to the mapping
for #36 u. These are strong arguments for the swap even if there
weren't the fact that U is part of the standard TO graphy for #37 and
that a rotated B looks like the standard TO graphy for #40.

I think we can consider the swap of BPJ2 #37 to U and #40 to B done.
Will you all Ted, Moira and Anthony please update your reference
documents. I will update mine tomorrow.

/BP

--
/ BP

I just realized another thing which speaks in favor of switching #37
to U and #40 to B: #40 B and #39 U will be mapped to uppercase letters
which are next to each other on the keyboard. At the same time #37 U
will be mapped to the uppercase letter corresponding to the mapping
for #36 u. These are strong arguments for the swap even if there
weren't the fact that U is part of the standard TO graphy for #37 and
that a rotated B looks like the standard TO graphy for #40.

I think we can consider the swap of BPJ2 #37 to U and #40 to B done.
Will you all Ted, Moira and Anthony please update your reference
documents. I will update mine tomorrow.

/BP

-- 
/ BP
